data.message: I'm incredibly shocked by the reactions posted by people claiming being gay is a disease and also something "god" would not have wanted. What gives you the right to judge how your fellow humans should live their lives. Here in the Netherlands gays have as many rights as any other inhabitant would have. We do not enforce each other's believes on one another. The mere fact that what you think is true or right doesn't give you the right to judge people who chose how to live their lives differently!

replies.message: netherlands is a cool country to live!

Well by that logic cannibalism would be ok if the eaten one was ok with it. Which it isn't and neither is homosexuality. I'm not trying to force people to behave, I just don't want my tax money encouraging them to misbehave.
I just quoted God you be the judge. I will live by my God,s laws till you kill me. In the public places I will point you out as unclean and immoral .
Snd if in the Netherlands, your government decides to take away the laws for stealing and murder you'll accept it too?
